page.title: 03News Stories on July 1st '85
page.content: {Explosion rips through Chemical {Factory.}The blast at Ashland Chemicals, Kidderminster started when large drums exploded sending thick, black smoke hundreds of feet into the air. One man suffered severe facial burns. {Kidderminster Carnival.}Last Saturday the Carnival drew a crowd of more than 4000 and was a tremendous success. The profit of more than 3500 pounds will go to a youth organisation in the town. { {American hijack hostages are on their {way home.}The 17-day nightmare has finally ended for the 39 passengers and crew of the TWA airliner. Today, they were freed by their terrorist captors. {Happy Birthday Princess Diana.}The Princess of Wales is 24 years old today.
